noticeDetails.subject: Registration for 1st year (2nd Semester) UG, Dual Degree, PG and Ph.D programmes

feePayment.path: Online Payment --> SBI E-Pay Tuition Fee
feePayment.notes: Students must pay the semester fee in full before subject registration.

subjectRegistration.instructions: Select all required subjects, submit to complete provisional registration, and print 3 sets of the registration slip for signatures from student and faculty advisor/supervisor.

physicalVerification.instruction: After online steps, students must mandatorily report physically to their Faculty Advisor and/or UG/PG Coordinator for verification to complete the registration process.

loanPaymentInstructions.requiredAction: Update transaction details and upload supporting documents in the MIS account and fill out the provided Google Form.

studentCategories.category: GEN/OBC(NCL) (Annual Family Income between 1Lac to 5 Lacs)

additionalNotes.note: Excess fees paid in the previous semester will be adjusted in the current semester.
Students who have not submitted the balance fee of the 1st semester can pay via the 'Backdated Payment Interface' on the MIS portal.
A minimum of 75% attendance is required to appear for Mid-Term and End-Term Examinations, effective from 08-01-2024.
For hostel-related matters, students may contact the Office of the Chief Warden.
